rules_text:
When Duskrider Cavalry enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
{W}, Discard Duskrider Cavalry: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: [i]The worst of the demons, in the eyes of Kinnamon and her legion is Zeramander. None chase them as cruelly or relentlessly as her.[/i]
